website_summaries.verdict: These super-soft adult wipes feature an aloe-based, rinse-free formula to clean, moisturize, and soothe the skin.
pros: Boast a cleansing formula that is pH-balanced and hypoallergenic
Sold in a resealable soft pack that helps keep the wipes moist
Perfect for everyday cleanups or incontinence care
Simple-to-follow warming instructions ensure you can enjoy extra comfort
cons: Wipes tend to leave a sticky residue
Very thin and can be difficult to remove from the packaging

customer_reviews.title: these are definitely "lightweight cloths" and nothing like what you see in the image
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention to the description: these are definitely "lightweight cloths" and nothing like what you see in the image, which makes them look like the "bath in a bag" towels you get in hospitals. These are even thinner than regular baby wipes and so tend to roll up in your hand while using them to wipe. They are slightly bigger than regular baby wipes, but they're so thin you end up using more to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Wireless Lou

customer_reviews.title: Size is listed wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I use personal wipes for a lot of things. I had tried the quilted wipes by this company and thought that's what I was getting. My fault. But these are very very thin and at least 18 inches long. When I try to pull them out of the container as many as 3 or 4 come out at one time. Putting them back in the container is not an option. They are soothing and smell great but hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my bedridden husband. Soft, easy to use, cleans well and the aloe helps prevent "diaper rash". Definitely like this product and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Martha B

customer_reviews.title: I do think they are pretty good for camping or emergency supplies though
customer_reviews.text: My wife spent some time in the hospital where they used a similar product to clean her in bed. She's still stuck in bed at home so we bought these thinking they were the same thing as at the hospital. While the hospital wipes were thick and wet, these are thin and damp. These may work, but not as well as the hospital wipes. Maybe this would be worthy of 4 stars if we didn't have the previous experience with the other product, but these are somewhat disappointing in comparison. I do think they are pretty good for camping or emergency supplies though, to save on water in a catastrophe.
customer_reviews.author: jkrispies

customer_reviews.title: These stink
customer_reviews.text: The package says "Fragence Free", but they absolutely stink. If they did not add fragrance, then the chemicals in them stink like cheap perfume. If you have asthma or allergies, these are bad. To make it worse, they are not soothing, they sting/burn. And, when you pull them from the package, they stretch out and you have to fold them multiple times to use them. Worst adult wipes I have ever purchased. If there was a zero rating, I would have given them a zero.
customer_reviews.author: Lilith

customer_reviews.title: Thin use two of them and not very wet at all -- no rinse, skin dries quickly
customer_reviews.text: First impression -- good value -- you are getting MANY wipes for your dollar. 2nd -- not very wet, more damp, large size but thin, I grabbed two -- but there are plenty in container to do that 3rd -- no skin irritation DO NOT FLUSH -- KEEP A PLASTIC BAG OR TRASH BIN WITH PLASTIC LINER NEXT TO YOUR TOILET. Fast shipping via Amazon Prime. I needed this quickly due to a UTI infection - medical need to keep really clean every single voiding of fluids.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn1492

customer_reviews.title: Thin but they work
customer_reviews.text: I like these okay; they are larger than baby wipes. They are quite long, but very thin, although they do not tear. Also, when you go to pul out one or two from the container, unless you are really careful, you'll pull out a long string of them.
customer_reviews.author: Lison

customer_reviews.title: Like the big sheets and unscented
customer_reviews.text: They are actually unscented which is what I wanted. Not a fan of scent with something like this. Nice big sturdy sheets. Bigger then baby wipes. Come out of the package easily. Moist and not dried out when I receive them. Nice big packages Been using them for about 2 years now for my mother and keep rebuying them.
customer_reviews.author: LCM

customer_reviews.title: Great product for those who can't bathe everyday.
customer_reviews.text: These body wipes are really great for anyone who is unable to shower or bath on a daily basis. The aloe really soothes the skin and their is a very light clean fragrance. I used them when recovering from a knee surgery. I have since purchased them for my daughter-in-law recovering from a C-Section. For aging parents who are unable to shower everyday. The price is fair for the number of wipes you get in one order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Suspected irritant ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for personal hygiene. It was horrible. I had inflamed, itchy, irritated skin from touching this product. as soon as I stopped using it, all of this went away. Additionally, The material is such that it is so thin you have to use more than one and then when you do so the material does not adhere to each other and is very slippery when using more than one together. This results in the materials sliding around a lot and being difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: they are barely wet. these are more like dry wipes. I have bought all different brand wipes in the past. These are the worst, and I made an even bigger mistake by purchasing a whole case. I should have looked to see if I could have bought just one package.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Product is great
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine. It is good value for the money but Amazon has now misdelivered three packages in the past week. If I have to drive all over to go pick up my packages I might as well have gone to the store. The most annoying part is possibly when they send you a picture of your package at someone else’s door or maybe it’s when they tell you it’s in your mailbox and it’s three times the size of your mailbox
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been buying this product for several years
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using theses for years! They are a good size and just the right dampness (as long as you remember to close the lid. My only complaint is that sometimes I get several sheets instead of just one but I just stuff the extras back in and carry on I really do recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: HODGEPODGESPVTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Nice size wipes for cleaning my elderly mother!
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are an all around help for whatever you may need them for in dealing with an elderly parent living with you: whether you are feeding them, doing crafts, cleaning their bottoms or sores, or just washing them up for a meal. I even use them for myself and in our art room. They are a nice size, smell fresh and feel good! We have been using them for a long time and plan on using them well into the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Renee Heustess DiDuro

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these!
customer_reviews.text: These are made in China. You have to double up so you don't get your fingers dirty. They are so thin you can see thru them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: large and soft
customer_reviews.text: While these are large and soft, I find it a bit frustrating that I cannot usually get one out at a time. When using them, most often I am using one hand and the dispensing of just one requires two hands, one to hold the container. While they are a good product, I prefer baby wipes, which come out of the container easier.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy J.

customer_reviews.title: Not the same wipe
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these wipes for a long time, but on my recent order, I saw that they had a different name. Today I opened them, what a disappointment! Not the same quality wipe, much thinner and much dryer. Just a much inferior product for the same price. Why does this happen? Got to make a buck at the condumers expense. Terrible
customer_reviews.author: Melody Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first negative review I've ever submitted but these are the worse, flimsy wipes I've tried to use. To make them at all usefull I had to use two at a time and even then fold them over to keep them effective for cleaning. I will never purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: llamamama

customer_reviews.title: I dislike the shape-they're long and narrow
customer_reviews.text: They do what they are supposed to do but I have a couple serious issues with them. I dislike the shape-they're long and narrow. Not very convenient to use. It's nearly impossible to get just one out at a time. I've gotten as many as four at one pull. Very frustrating! I can't understand how this product has received so many positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: JCH

customer_reviews.title: Different Package look
customer_reviews.text: I believe the product that I received is the same as the UPC did match the order. The packaging did look different and did not state AloeTouch as I have been buying locally. this was confusing for my Mother. Her wipes looked like the picture in the advertisement. What I received in capital letters stated BESTFIT. I am in hopes it is the same product as it works well with my mothers sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Very very thin
customer_reviews.text: In order to use these for any sort of “clean up” they need to be doubled and tripled. They are very very thin.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Kelly Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Why use baby wipes? Only way to go!
customer_reviews.text: These are what they give you in the hospital when you have a baby. Everything after that just doesn't compare! Best wipes ever. Would have given 5 stars but the packing sometimes is frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Robby

customer_reviews.title: Stick together to easily
customer_reviews.text: We use wipes similar to these for my grandmother and bought these cause overall it was a savings compared to what we usually buy. Unfortunately these wipes are incredibly hard to separate from each other and come out in clumps from the packaging. Once we use what we have, we won’t be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Miller

customer_reviews.title: Longer than expected and thinner
customer_reviews.text: The wipes are longer than I expected and you can almost see through them. But good during TP shortages
customer_reviews.author: Scott R Vance

customer_reviews.title: great sheets but dangit, it's hard to pull out one at a time from the container
customer_reviews.text: Great sheets. Very comfortable. Unscented as advertised. Unfortunately, it's almost impossible to pull out one at a time. Especially at the start of each package and at the end. Crazy-making!
customer_reviews.author: Archer Phil

customer_reviews.title: Good for whole body when shower not available
customer_reviews.text: these are about the size to wipe your whole body. They are great for wiping down after tennis or gardening. Do note they are not flushable and are too large for personal cleansing cloths
customer_reviews.author: First time Grandma at 71!

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for the care of my father. Very good quality. Soft for his breaking skin and the size is awesome. Work MUCH better than baby wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Music Girl

customer_reviews.title: My Dad is happy and his rash is gone.
customer_reviews.text: I get these for my 83 year old father. He is blind with zero sense of smell so I could not rate scent or presentation but boy is he happy. I have ordered these 3 times now and his last comment was, ‘I sure hope they don’t stop making these! ‘ His skin got severely irritated with occasional use of incontinence products. These wipes got his skin back to normal quickly and it has stayed that way for almost a year using this product on a regular basis. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy H

customer_reviews.title: Rather Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The towelettes we received are not very moist 6 months before expiration date. Had used this product while in hospital and wanted to use at home- will use but not moist enough to do much good- Will not be able to use before expiration date so rather disappointed hospital pkgs were nice and moist not sure if problem is because of storage prior to purchase or just not a good purchase when bought in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxene J.

customer_reviews.title: Received only a hundred wipes
customer_reviews.text: I received the package of only 1 package of 100 count instead of the 600 count I was promised. The result is over $3 per wipe. Sadly I am currently recovering from covid-19 and in a nursing home situation where wipes are scarce.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Dino

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your orders are correct immediately when you receive them
customer_reviews.text: This product Was half the size as described in its description. The description stated the size as 8x12 but in actuality it was 6x9. I depend on the description of product in order to choose one that best fit our needs. I am the care giver for my elderly mother. The product that I was sent would best serve a baby. If you order this make sure you check the size of the towel as soon as it arrives. Just follow Corbin-19 precautions for opening packages. Angela R.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Size Wipes
customer_reviews.text: I am a large woman and just had rotator cuff surgery so have not been able to bathe regularly. In between showers, used these wipes to clean up and they are just the right size. They are sturdy and soft at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: mghastings

customer_reviews.title: Not flushable
customer_reviews.text: You need to enlarge the photo to see that they're not flushable or see the small box on the page to know. It should be in the description. Why would I want to wipe myself and throw it in the trashcan. I'll use them for something else because I don't want to spend one third of the refund for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: s. neff

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Brand, Size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size with aloe. Comes in package of 6 through Subscribe and Save. I only have to buy a package once every 5 or 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: CBK

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: The only problem that I had with these wipes, is when you pull one wipe, sometimes you 3 or more at the same time. I use these washing myself as I am an amputee.
customer_reviews.author: Lore & Jim W.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good value
customer_reviews.text: Need wipes every night for an incontinent patient. These are substantial quality, and decent size. Good value for 600 wipes, and will keep us stocked for some time.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Alcohol and fragrance free! No sticky residue
customer_reviews.text: We have used these wipes for my daughter her entire life. They are the ones used at our local hospital and we fell in love with them. They are big, and very soft do they don’t chafe. They don’t leave a sticky residue and they are unscented as well. We tried other wipes like Kirkland, Huggies, and Parents Choice and kept coming back to these. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Medline MSC263954 Aloetouch Personal Cleansing Wipes -- GENTLE YET EFFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: These personal care wipes are excellent. They do clean thoroughly -- tested their cleaning power on my bathroom sink. They are mild and non-irritating to the user. There is a safe and effective antiseptic listed as an ingredient. These wipes are NOT PERFUMED. The wipes do have a light scent when first opened. That odor disiipates quickly -- important for allergy sufferers. I highly recommend this product. Thanks to the manufacturer for being so conscious of ALL the problems likely to occur with frequent usage.
customer_reviews.author: whippersnapper

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this brand for over the 4 yrs was pleased until the last delivery the wipes are defective lots of holes in wipes.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: These things are great. Big enough to clean up an adult and not irritate their skin. Very sturdy, your fingers don’t poke through them.
customer_reviews.author: NMCB26

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They are not very moist. I ordered them because the price was good, but not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent when bathing is a problem
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my father who is unable to take an actual shower or bath right now. He loves the way the make his skin feel clean and fresh. I've noted that it helps to relieve the dryness of his skin too.
customer_reviews.author: dragonviolet

customer_reviews.title: These are large and work great
customer_reviews.text: A real life savor for taking care of elderly people. Large and works great on small and large cleanups. Has skin softeners and does not sting. No complaints. Strong and Sturdy - Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this product, high quality, easy to use and clean, well packed and fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price unpredictable if on subscription
customer_reviews.text: Good product but price fluctuates too much. Had them on subscription. Have to remove it because of price unpredictability
customer_reviews.author: btybureau0604

customer_reviews.title: Adult-use wipes are nicely moistened and do a nice job cleaning up
customer_reviews.text: I use these wipes with my disabled husband, who is diaper-dependent. They are a good generous size and when doubled, can really handle even messy cleanups. They are not strongly scented, which I appreciate, and gentle on skin. I have ordered these wipes several times and will continue to do so. Very pleased with them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large, soft, moist & durable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cleaning or bathing. Soft, moist & highly durable and large in size
customer_reviews.author: Pam R

customer_reviews.title: These are the absolute BEST! We have been using these for 3 years ...
customer_reviews.text: Both of my children have extremely sensitive skin. All of the store bought "sensitive" or "frangrance free" wipes still cause irritation/rash on my children. These are the absolute BEST! We have been using these for 3 years now and would never use another wipe. The wipes are a large size - so you can typically tear one in half if you're just cleaning up pee-pee :) We order one 6-pack (100/each) and it lasts us a month. That's with 2 children and us using them occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Horkman

customer_reviews.title: Very good for when need cleaning up under abnormal conditions
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cleaning up your self when you can't do it under normal conditions
customer_reviews.author: Blind Lightnin Mojo Hand

customer_reviews.title: My Go To Buy for My Son
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes: - durable - large - neutral scent - good ingredients Price is also better than another brand I was previously using
customer_reviews.author: ItsJustHair

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my mom to clean around her ostomy area. They used these kind at the nursing home where she used to be. They smell nice and are very soothing - not irritating at all. We will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: C Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product in a larger size which is nice for elderly people.
customer_reviews.author: CJ M.

customer_reviews.title: Not what it used to be.
customer_reviews.text: After 3 years of using this product they changed the quality along with the price. I have a subscription and this month (Nov 2018) The price went up, the packaging changed and so did the texture of it. Its not as soft as it was in October 2018.
customer_reviews.author: karson310

customer_reviews.title: Fit right aloe personal wipes
customer_reviews.text: Love em, I purchased these to make my own alcohol wipes , great product
customer_reviews.author: mz tee

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than a regular wipe
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than a regular wipe and also stronger Worth the extra cost when the mess is bigger than usual
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: These are even thinner than regular wipes and tend to roll up in your hand while using them. They are slightly bigger than regular wipes, but they're so thin you end up using more to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Ann D

customer_reviews.title: Large, soft, but a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Using for elderly adult incontinence and these are large enough to wipe and fold over and rewipe with same cloth. Not flushable but very soft and durable to remove waste from the skin. Most care facilities use these so they must be effective on the majority of clients needing these wipes. Since they aren't covered by insurance or Medicare, they can become pricey vs. a Wal-Mart type baby wipe for each bathroom trip. I would always buy if the price was lowered. Hint, hint Medline.
customer_reviews.author: D Gill

customer_reviews.title: Thin, flimsy and very long. Hard to use.
customer_reviews.text: These look like a cheap version of an adult wipe, thin, long and difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: JLewis

customer_reviews.title: Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, just a little narrower than others and seem to stretch out longer. Not quite as most, which I kind of like though.
customer_reviews.author: KLS

customer_reviews.title: This is an absolutely terrible product. Do not buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product. The towelettes are cheesecloth thin, not moist enough, and simply wrinkled up so that you can clean anything. Do not buy this product it's complete crap.
customer_reviews.author: David Brown

customer_reviews.title: Nope, dont do it.
customer_reviews.text: These are so thin and stringy. Not thick at all.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shopped for affordable price after previous product begin raising prices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So helpful of a product I will recommend these 100%
customer_reviews.text: I love how big each wipe is... It's excellent for helping tidy up the elderly in my family and one to two wipes is all that's necessary to properly cleanse...
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: They work fine
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely large wipes. Even after reading the description, they are larger than I expected. They are very absorbent and do the job
customer_reviews.author: mark pipetTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Soft, smell good and large size. Oftentimes more than one comes out at a time, but am able to push back inside. Grateful to be able to find some available and they arrived earlier than expected!
customer_reviews.author: LSB

customer_reviews.title: ... buy these for my mother and they are a good size and weight to clean effectively
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my mother and they are a good size and weight to clean effectively. The dispenser is also very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Lori D.

customer_reviews.title: These wipes are great! I bought them because that’s what they used ...
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are great! I bought them because that’s what they used on him at the hospital. These are longer and work very well.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great value.  Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Especially if you are caring for someone that is bed ridden.
customer_reviews.author: B.E.

customer_reviews.title: I thought with the review they would be great wrong
customer_reviews.text: They give me a rash , with cost I’m biting I’m not pleased I have been able too use these . I may have tossed out the Original box it was so big I may still try to return
customer_reviews.author: Just a shopper

customer_reviews.title: I recommend the larger size of the same wipe.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good cleaning product. However, there is a larger size towel in the same product line that is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality wipe
customer_reviews.text: Thick and grips well for adult diaper cleanup, but the length is weird/too long
customer_reviews.author: Silver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Used on me when I was in 2 month rehab facility. Never irritates and cleans gently. I'm currently using for an ostomy bag and it does a great job cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Beware of this product
customer_reviews.text: Was unhappy with this order. It was as what was listed in the discription. Mailed it back for a refund and it’s been over 2 weeks and I am yet to get my refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jett Mosher

customer_reviews.title: Better products are available.
customer_reviews.text: These cloth wipes are so flimsy that it is difficult to get the most out of them. It takes two of these to do the job of one of another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Tru in TX

customer_reviews.title: They perform very well..!
customer_reviews.text: I used these to wipes to refresh my face and hands and soothe my tired eyes..! Will buy again..!
customer_reviews.author: ROY ALLISON

customer_reviews.title: Saved the day.
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery during this catastrophe of the coronavirus causing empty shelves and hard to find items. Used by my bedridden father who relies on these essentials.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Too Thin--Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are so thin, you can see through them. They wad up and tear. They're not much better than wet toilet paper. A damp paper towel would work better. I do not recommend buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These wipes are SUPER. Used them in the hospital
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are SUPER. Used them in the hospital. Large and moist, they do the job. Just don't flush them, they're big.
customer_reviews.author: MEB

customer_reviews.title: Thin and limp
customer_reviews.text: The wipes are flimsy. They must be folded at least once to be usable. Much thinner that typical baby wipes
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Keep skin hydrated.
customer_reviews.text: These feel great, and the aloe keeps my skin hydrated. I use these out in the field when I do not have a shower.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher T. Drost

customer_reviews.title: great for after TP
customer_reviews.text: I use these on my butt when camping and using porta-pottys and wag bag toilets and they're awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Baugh

customer_reviews.title: Keep these wipes in home, car and
customer_reviews.text: Multipurpose wipes that are excellent in the home or on the road. Will be ordering another case in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Big Dave

customer_reviews.title: Work great. Can even put in your purse to bring to work and bag when traveling
customer_reviews.text: This is what they used when I was overnight in a hospital. I like them a lot so I bought these to help out prior to having my rotator cuff and bicep tendon repaired. They were such a help. I like them for traveling too and will probably buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Rosita Cornejo

customer_reviews.title: Durable and clean well.
customer_reviews.text: These arrived timely. THey are very durable and do a great job with personal cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Rollohondo

customer_reviews.title: Valued product
customer_reviews.text: Got a nice supply now and this works very well.
customer_reviews.author: RogueBurn

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell and moisture
customer_reviews.text: Seem to not be as thick as I expected. I usually use one of our old brand but need to use 2 about 1/2 the time. Nice smell and moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Velma Schope

customer_reviews.title: The same as the hospital uses.
customer_reviews.text: Just like the hospital...they are a lifesaver for incontinent and no control persons.
customer_reviews.author: BJColbert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the BEST. Thin, soft, and gentle wipes that are generously sized. My go-to!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: These are handy to use when you have a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Jane E. Gates

customer_reviews.title: Quilted Medline in the best choice.
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the quilted Medline Aloe Touch instead of the lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Learning the best way to use them.
customer_reviews.text: To clean myself after rest room break. So useable for other jobs in cleanup in restroom.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Perry

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are a good productproduct. I just like the adult washcloths much better. The Hospice agency uses these also.
customer_reviews.author: MelindaMS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like these, even use them on my dog when he comes in from outside
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Medlne
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as good as the hospital's but very good!
customer_reviews.author: Lois Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: Price quaged
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive for what they are. I believe i was price gauged during the beginning of the pandemic. I would not recommend buying from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Simmonie Serbousek

customer_reviews.title: Good disposable washcloths, great price
customer_reviews.text: These were for a friend. They serve their purpose very well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: The only problem with these wipes is when trying to pull one out sometimes they do not separate properly and four or five come out as a lump. This occurs about every third or fourth time.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Jim Bissel

customer_reviews.title: Huge waste of time
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could rate this lower! They aren’t soft they are super thin and then are not flushable which they were originally listed as.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: They are soooo thin
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for larger and still thick. These are very thin, you have to use a few and even then they roll up.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Best available on the market.
customer_reviews.text: I am a senior person who occasionally needs a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

product_meta.title: FitRight Aloe Personal Cleansing Cloth Wipes, Unscented, 8 x 12 inch Adult Large Incontinence Wipes, 100 count, pack of 6
product_meta.description:
Style:Fragrance Free(100 Count Pack | 6 Packs)Simplify and improve incontinence care with FitRight AloeTouch Lightweight Wipes. Single use, spunlace cloth provides exceptional cleansing, moisturizing and skin protection in one step. Aloetouch full-sized, standard weight, durable wet wipes with a touch of soothing aloe are perfect for everyday clean-ups and incontinence care. The ph-balanced, hypoallergenic and alcohol-free wipes provide exceptional skin care. Single patient use wipes help to reduce the risk of cross contamination. Do not flush.

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
8006335463
feature_bullets: Soft, gentle wipes for incontinence care take the place of harsh soaps and rough washcloths with no rinsing required
Personal cleansing wipes are pre-moistened with an aloe based cleansing formula to cleanse, moisturize and soothe skin
pH balanced, hypoallergenic and alcohol free wipes are fragrance free
Single use wipes dispense one at a time to reduce the risk of cross contamination and waste
Soft pack with flip top lid helps keep wipes moist | 100 wipes per pack, 6 packs per case (600 total wipes)
